valueProp: Marshall Law Group - TradeMarks The Spot® is a firm that specializes in a broad range of intellectual property matters, including international and domestic trademark prosecution, performing and reviewing trademark searches, and counseling clients regarding trademark clearance, trademark enforcement, negotiation and drafting of agreements, and opposition practice. The firm manages intellectual property portfolios for both large and small organizations and provides comprehensive legal services in areas of trademark, advertising, entertainment, and copyright law. It is involved in all aspects of the creation, clearance, prosecution, maintenance, and litigation of intellectual property rights, advises and assists clients with intellectual property acquisitions and portfolio strategies, and has extensive involvement with USPTO and TTAB matters including office action responses and TTAB actions. The firm is proficient at negotiation and drafting settlement and coexistence agreements and deals with internet trademark and copyright issues such as protection of domain names. It represents clients from a wide range of consumer-based and service industries.
topics: Intellectual Property Acquisitions and Portfolio Strategies
